name: hymnoscribe
description: HymnoScribe is a hymn and song management application for churches or music leaders. It organizes lyrics, chords and sets, and provides a web interface for planning services and exporting or displaying song sheets.

features.title: Song Library
features.description: Organize hymns and worship songs with lyrics, chords, and metadata

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Display and edit chord progressions for musicians and worship teams

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Generate and export printable song sheets with lyrics and chords

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find songs quickly by title, lyrics, or theme

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share setlists and song arrangements with worship team members
